title: "Cheat Engine" allows Rito to scan your pc in real time
body: Why does my game crash if i have Cheat Engine typed into my BROWSER? is that how cheat engines work? I DO NOT USE A CHEAT ENGINE BTW, im just wondering how much information Rito actually collects during their crash report that said it would take 5 minutes to finish up...  5 minutes?!?!?! what data are you collecting, and whats the reasoning behind this spy tactic?

replies.body:
This is extremely old news, and the answer is that it's just looking at your computer's active processes, which is something any process can do.

Also, even if this was an actual problem, it wouldn't be a bug, so you posted in the wrong place anyway.
